response.overview: Akari, whose husband is a violent Yakuza member, is forced to hide out in a local hot spring inn due to the conflict. While spending her days alone, she meets Mac, a quiet, craftsman-like black man. Akari is gradually drawn to him, who loves Japanese culture and has a samurai-like spirit. However, when her husband comes to check on her, he once again becomes violent towards her. Mac rescues her, and Akari, captivated by his manliness, exposes her body to Mac... A serious raw creampie sex session in which sweaty white and black skin are densely intertwined! Free trial points available for the first time!
